Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable

Player

Represents a player in the game. Each player has a username, color, a spaceship, credits, score, and state flags for retirement and disconnection.

The player is responsible for managing their own spaceship, accumulating credits and score, and interacting with the game server through a ClientDescriptor.

See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getUsername

      public String getUsername()
      Returns the username of the player.
      Returns:
      the player's username

    • getColor

      public PlayerColor getColor()
      Returns the color assigned to the player.
      Returns:
      PlayerColor The player's color.

    • retire

      public void retire()
      Marks the player as retired. Adds all current credits to the score, and half the value of stored cargo.
      Throws:
      AlreadyPoweredException - if the player is already retired.

    • getRetired

      public boolean getRetired()
      Checks whether the player has retired.
      Returns:
      true if retired, false otherwise.

    • reconnect

      public void reconnect()
      Reconnects the player to the game.
      Throws:
      AlreadyPoweredException - if the player is already connected.

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect()
      Disconnects the player from the game.
      Throws:
      AlreadyPoweredException - if already disconnected.

    • getDisconnected

      public boolean getDisconnected()
      Checks whether the player is currently disconnected.
      Returns:
      true if disconnected.

    • giveCredits

      public void giveCredits(int amount)
      Increases the player's credits by a given amount.
      Parameters:
      amount - Credits to be added (must be positive).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if amount is zero or negative.

    • getCredits

      public int getCredits()
      Returns the current amount of credits.
      Returns:
      the player's credits

    • finalScore

      public void finalScore()
      Calculates and applies the final score at the end of the game. Adds score from cargo and remaining credits.

    • reconnect

      public void reconnect(ClientDescriptor new_descriptor)
      Reconnects the player using a new ClientDescriptor.
      Parameters:
      new_descriptor - ClientDescriptor the new descriptor to bind.

    • getSpaceShip

      public SpaceShip getSpaceShip()
      Returns the player's spaceship.
      Returns:
      SpaceShip instance.

    • bindDescriptor

      public void bindDescriptor(ClientDescriptor descriptor)
      Binds a ClientDescriptor to the player. Used during login or reconnection.
      Parameters:
      descriptor - ClientDescriptor the client descriptor to bind.

    • getDescriptor

      public ClientDescriptor getDescriptor()
      Returns the ClientDescriptor bound to the player.
      Returns:
      ClientDescriptor Descriptor.

    • voyageInfo

      public String voyageInfo(iPlanche planche)
      Returns a formatted string with voyage information: position, score, credits, engine power, cannon power, crew, battery level.
      Parameters:
      planche - the iPlanche containing position information.
      Returns:
      string describing the player's current state in the voyage.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object o)
      Compares two players based on their username and color.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      o - the object to compare.
      Returns:
      true if same username and color, otherwise false.
